doc.title: 2006 Parkening International Guitar Competition
doc.plot: Fifteen Guitarists from twelve countries gather at Pepperdine University in Malibu, CA for the inaugural Parkening International Guitar Competition (May/June 2006). The competition is fierce, and the purse is worth $25,000. The cameras take you along for the ride, with excerpts from the judges, competitors, and the competition's namesake, Christopher Parkening

Fifteen Guitarists from twelve countries gather at Pepperdine University in Malibu, CA for the inaugural Parkening International Guitar Competition (May/June 2006). The competition is fierce, and the purse is worth $25,000. The cameras take you along for the ride, with excerpts from the judges, competitors, and the competition's namesake, Christopher Parkening
